author: jgm
content:
Personally, I'd like to get the events sorted out.  There is an open PR for it but I need to go back and provide more justification.

The only other thing that I can think of that isn't already present in a PR would be moving the submission of attestations to accept an array rather than the current single attestation.  I can raise a PR for that in the next few hours.

author: jgm
content: Just written up https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/pull/102 which discusses moving attestation submission from one attestation per request to an array of attestations.

author: jgm
content: Also added another comment to https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/pull/96 regarding state events.  If this stuff is off-base then happy to discuss, but given the previous conversation on this I _think_ we need something like this for validator clients to work properly.
